gui

Class Panel2D

  • Object
    • gui.Panel2D

  • public class Panel2D
extends Object
    This class manages the 2D array of components that contain individual text characters, and the execution of thread code that periodically draws to make animation possible.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Panel2D

        Panel2D()
        Initializes a JPanel and a 2D array of JTextAreas for displaying animation. The first characters filled into the 2D array are backticks (`) to help with debugging. The dimensions are set to be the correct size to show all JTextAreas in the 2D array.

    • Method Detail

      • setActors

        public void setActors(ArrayList<Drawable> actors)
        To be able to set up a collection of animated objects in the game.
        Parameters:
        actors - The collection of objects to animate later.

      • schedulePanelUpdates

        void schedulePanelUpdates(int millis)
        Code that executes on a separate thread from our main program. We need this so that repainting frames for animation are not dependant on slow calculations used to draw in the frame.
        Parameters:
        millis - The number of milliseconds (*2) between executions of the updater code.

      • set

        public void set(int x,
                int y,
                int pixelsIndex,
                int colorsIndex)
        Assign a char value to an (x, y) position along with its colour.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal position inside the 2D array of JTextAreas.
        y - The vertical position inside the 2D array of JTextAreas.
        pixelsIndex - The index for PIXELS array to be stored within the bitmap 2D array.
        colorsIndex - The index for COLORS array to be stored within the colors 2D array.

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(Point2D first,
                     Point2D second,
                     int pixelsIndex,
                     int colorsIndex)
        Avoids using floating-point arithmetic for a faster drawing of a line.
        Parameters:
        first - The start position of the straight line.
        second - The end position of the straight line.
        pixelsIndex - The index of the PIXELS character used to draw the line.
        colorsIndex - The index for which of the COLORS is used to draw the line.

      • getJPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel getJPanel()
        Get the JPanel jpanel container which holds all JTextAreas.
        Returns:
        The JPanel that contains the 2D array of JTextAreas.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Get the WIDTH, the number of JTextArea columns.
        Returns:
        The number of JTextArea columns in the JPanel.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get the HEIGHT, the number of JTextArea rows.
        Returns:
        The number of JTextArea rows in the JPanel.
